name: Reda
description: Import, organise, share and read your books, articles, and other digital documents anytime, anywhere.

name: Bazooka
description: Find and terminate processes on your machine from your browser.

name: Jenzo
description: Generate meta images on the fly using HTML templates.

name: Gots
description: Generate Typescript types from your chosen Go types (int, string, structs etc) during run-time.

name: QuikSnip
description: Create and share EDITABLE code snippets with ease (unstable).

name: Hitlist
description: Execute multiple commands with a single command.

name: PHP Router
description: A composer package that brings Express-like routing to PHP with support for middleware, class-based callbacks, dynamic routes etc
